# CustomMaterial.Blending.transparent(opacity:)

**Case**

A transparent or translucent surface.

## Declaration

```swift
case transparent(opacity: CustomMaterial.Opacity)
```

## Specifying transparency

- **CustomMaterial.Blending.opaque**: An opaque surface.
